snippet.title: Pile Up! - Announcement Trailer
snippet.description:
Pile Up! is a strategic building game in which you need to build houses, fulfill your people’s requests and manage your risky buildings in different ways on a small land. But don’t let your guard down in this chill environment, we only get you relaxed so you destroy everything you did.

Wishlist "Pile Up!" Now! https://store.steampowered.com/app/2094910/Pile_Up/

Developed by Remoob, Pile Up! is targeting a Steam Early Access Launch in late 2022.

📮 Follow Us 📮
🔹Official Website: https://remoobgames.com/
🔹Twitter: https://twitter.com/GamesRemoob
🔹LinkedIn: https://www.linkedin.com/company/remoob/
🔹Itch.io: https://remoob.itch.io/

About Remoob:
Remoob is an independent game development studio based in Turkey that aims to develop games that feel noteworthy with the love of making compelling games with unique atmospheres.
